title: Spaghetti Bolognese
ingredients: spaghetti, ground beef, tomato sauce, onion, garlic, olive oil, basil
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry onion and garlic, add beef, tomato sauce, simmer, mix with pasta.

title: Chicken Salad
ingredients: chicken breast, lettuce, cucumber, tomato, olive oil, lemon juice
instructions: Grill chicken, chop veggies, mix together, drizzle with oil and lemon.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: broccoli, bell pepper, carrot, soy sauce, garlic, ginger, sesame oil
instructions: Chop vegetables. Stir fry with garlic, ginger, and soy sauce.

title: Beef Tacos
ingredients: taco shells, ground beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, sour cream
instructions: Cook beef with spices, assemble tacos with toppings.

title: Pancakes
ingredients: flour, milk, eggs, sugar, butter, maple syrup
instructions: Mix batter, cook pancakes on skillet, serve with butter and syrup.

title: Margherita Pizza
ingredients: pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella, basil, olive oil
instructions: Spread sauce on dough, add mozzarella and basil, bake in oven.

title: Grilled Salmon
ingredients: salmon fillet, lemon, olive oil, salt, pepper
instructions: Season salmon, grill 4-5 min per side, serve with lemon.

title: Caprese Salad
ingredients: tomato, mozzarella, basil, olive oil, balsamic vinegar
instructions: Slice tomato and mozzarella, layer with basil, drizzle with oil and vinegar.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: flour, sugar, butter, eggs, chocolate chips, baking soda, vanilla
instructions: Mix ingredients, scoop onto baking sheet, bake at 180C for 10-12 min.

title: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
ingredients: shrimp, garlic, butter, lemon juice, parsley, salt, pepper
instructions: Sauté garlic in butter, add shrimp, cook 2-3 min, finish with lemon and parsley.

title: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: beef, mushrooms, onion, sour cream, beef broth, flour, butter
instructions: Cook beef, sauté mushrooms and onions, add broth and cream, simmer.

title: Greek Salad
ingredients: cucumber, tomato, red onion, feta cheese, olives, olive oil, oregano
instructions: Chop veggies, add feta and olives, drizzle with olive oil and oregano.

title: Fried Rice
ingredients: rice, egg, peas, carrot, soy sauce, green onion, sesame oil
instructions: Scramble eggs, stir fry veggies, add rice and soy sauce, finish with sesame oil.

title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
ingredients: fettuccine, chicken breast, cream, parmesan, garlic, butter
instructions: Cook pasta, sauté chicken, make cream sauce, combine with pasta.

title: Tuna Sandwich
ingredients: bread, tuna, mayonnaise, celery, lettuce, salt, pepper
instructions: Mix tuna with mayo and celery, spread on bread with lettuce.

title: Avocado Toast
ingredients: bread, avocado, salt, pepper, lemon juice, chili flakes
instructions: Mash avocado with lemon, salt, pepper, spread on toast, sprinkle chili flakes.

title: Mushroom Risotto
ingredients: arborio rice, mushrooms, onion, garlic, vegetable broth, parmesan, butter
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic, add rice and broth gradually, stir in mushrooms and parmesan.

title: BBQ Chicken Wings
ingredients: chicken wings, barbecue sauce, salt, pepper, garlic powder
instructions: Season wings, bake until crispy, toss in barbecue sauce.

title: Omelette
ingredients: eggs, milk, salt, pepper, cheese, vegetables (optional)
instructions: Beat eggs with milk, cook in pan, add fillings, fold and serve.

title: Tomato Soup
ingredients: tomatoes, onion, garlic, vegetable broth, cream, basil, salt, pepper
instructions: Cook tomatoes with onion and garlic, blend, simmer with broth, add cream and basil.

title: Beef Burger
ingredients: ground beef, burger buns, lettuce, tomato, cheese, ketchup, mustard
instructions: Form patties, grill beef, assemble burger with toppings.

title: Shrimp Tacos
ingredients: shrimp, taco shells, cabbage, lime, cilantro, sour cream, spices
instructions: Cook shrimp with spices, assemble tacos with cabbage and sauce.

title: Pesto Pasta
ingredients: pasta, basil pesto, parmesan, pine nuts, olive oil
instructions: Cook pasta, mix with pesto, sprinkle parmesan and pine nuts.

title: Vegetable Soup
ingredients: carrot, celery, potato, onion, garlic, vegetable broth, herbs
instructions: Chop vegetables, cook in broth with herbs until tender.

title: Cheesecake
ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, eggs, graham crackers, butter, vanilla extract
instructions: Mix crust, press in pan, mix filling, bake, cool and serve.

title: Fish and Chips
ingredients: white fish fillets, potatoes, flour, beer, salt, oil
instructions: Prepare batter, coat fish, deep fry, serve with fried potatoes.

title: Caesar Salad
ingredients: romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan, Caesar dressing, chicken (optional)
instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing, add croutons and parmesan, optionally add grilled chicken.

title: Stuffed Peppers
ingredients: bell peppers, rice, ground beef, onion, tomato sauce, cheese, herbs
instructions: Hollow peppers, mix filling, stuff peppers, bake and top with cheese.

title: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: flour, sugar, cocoa, eggs, butter, baking powder, milk
instructions: Mix ingredients, bake in pan at 180C, cool and frost if desired.

title: Fajitas
ingredients: chicken or beef, bell peppers, onion, tortillas, spices, oil
instructions: Cook meat with spices, sauté peppers and onion, serve in tortillas.

title: Pancit Noodles
ingredients: rice noodles, chicken, shrimp, vegetables, soy sauce, garlic
instructions: Cook chicken and shrimp, sauté vegetables, add noodles and sauce, toss well.

title: Guacamole
ingredients: avocado, lime juice, onion, tomato, cilantro, salt
instructions: Mash avocado, mix in chopped ingredients and lime, serve with chips.

title: Lasagna
ingredients: lasagna noodles, ground beef, tomato sauce, ricotta, mozzarella, parmesan
instructions: Layer noodles, meat sauce, cheeses, bake at 180C for 45 min.

title: Clam Chowder
ingredients: clams, potatoes, onion, celery, bacon, cream, butter
instructions: Cook bacon, sauté veggies, add clams and broth, simmer and add cream.

title: Banana Bread
ingredients: bananas, flour, sugar, eggs, butter, baking soda, vanilla
instructions: Mash bananas, mix ingredients, bake in loaf pan at 175C for 50-60 min.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: bread, cheddar cheese, butter
instructions: Butter bread, place cheese between slices, grill until golden brown.

title: Greek Salad
ingredients: tomatoes, cucumber, onion, feta, olives, olive oil, oregano
instructions: Chop vegetables, add feta and olives, drizzle with olive oil and oregano.

title: Beef Stew
ingredients: beef, carrots, potatoes, onion, celery, beef broth, tomato paste, herbs
instructions: Brown beef, add vegetables and broth, simmer until tender.

title: Caprese Salad
ingredients: tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, olive oil, balsamic vinegar
instructions: Layer tomatoes and mozzarella, sprinkle basil, drizzle oil and vinegar.

title: Shepherd's Pie
ingredients: ground lamb or beef, onion, carrots, peas, mashed potatoes, butter
instructions: Cook meat with veggies, top with mashed potatoes, bake until golden.

title: Pad Thai
ingredients: rice noodles, shrimp or chicken, eggs, tofu, bean sprouts, peanuts, sauce
instructions: Cook protein, scramble eggs, sauté noodles with sauce and veggies, top with peanuts.

title: Egg Fried Rice
ingredients: rice, eggs, peas, carrots, onion, soy sauce, oil
instructions: Scramble eggs, sauté veggies, add rice and soy sauce, stir-fry well.

title: Chicken Curry
ingredients: chicken, onion, garlic, ginger, tomato, coconut milk, curry powder
instructions: Cook onion, garlic, ginger, add chicken and spices, stir in tomato and coconut milk.

title: Beef Tacos
ingredients: ground beef, taco shells, lettuce, tomato, cheese, salsa
instructions: Cook beef with spices, assemble tacos with toppings.

title: Mac and Cheese
ingredients: macaroni, cheddar cheese, milk, butter, flour
instructions: Cook pasta, make cheese sauce with butter, flour, milk, mix with pasta.

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: mushrooms, breadcrumbs, garlic, cheese, herbs, olive oil
instructions: Mix filling, stuff mushrooms, bake at 180C until golden.

title: Baked Salmon
ingredients: salmon fillets, lemon, garlic, dill, olive oil, salt, pepper
instructions: Season salmon, bake at 200C for 12-15 min.

title: Chili Con Carne
ingredients: ground beef, kidney beans, tomato, onion, garlic, chili powder
instructions: Cook beef with onion and garlic, add beans, tomatoes, and chili, simmer.

title: French Toast
ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, sugar, cinnamon, butter
instructions: Dip bread in egg mixture, fry in butter until golden, serve with syrup.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: broccoli, bell peppers, carrots, soy sauce, garlic, oil
instructions: Sauté vegetables in oil with garlic, add soy sauce, stir-fry until tender.

ingredients: flour, sugar, butter, yeast, milk, cinnamon, eggs
instructions: Prepare dough, roll with cinnamon sugar, bake, glaze with icing.

ingredients: lentils, onion, carrot, celery, garlic, vegetable broth, spices
instructions: Cook vegetables, add lentils and broth, simmer until tender.

ingredients: shrimp, garlic, butter, lemon, parsley, pasta
instructions: Cook shrimp in butter and garlic, toss with pasta and lemon juice.

instructions: Mix filling, pour into crust, bake at 180C until set.

ingredients: beans, pasta, carrot, celery, zucchini, tomato, onion, garlic, broth
instructions: Cook vegetables, add beans, pasta, and broth, simmer until tender.

ingredients: flour, milk, eggs, sugar, baking powder, butter
instructions: Mix ingredients, pour batter on hot pan, cook until golden on both sides.

instructions: Coat chicken with flour, egg, breadcrumbs, fry until golden and cooked through.

instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing, top with croutons, parmesan, and chicken.

title: Tomato Soup
ingredients: tomatoes, onion, garlic, vegetable broth, cream, basil
instructions: Cook tomatoes and onion, blend, add broth and cream, simmer, season.

instructions: Mix butter with garlic and parsley, spread on bread, bake until golden.

instructions: Cook pasta, mix with sauce and cheese, bake until bubbly.

ingredients: tuna, mayo, celery, onion, lettuce, tomato
instructions: Mix tuna with mayo, celery, onion, serve on lettuce or sandwich.

title: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: beef, mushrooms, onion, sour cream, mustard, noodles
instructions: Cook beef with onions and mushrooms, add sour cream and mustard, serve over noodles.

ingredients: ground beef or lamb, mashed potatoes, peas, carrots, onion, butter
instructions: Cook meat with veggies, top with mashed potatoes, bake until golden.

ingredients: eggs, bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, cheese, oil

ingredients: chicken breast, fettuccine, cream, parmesan, garlic, butter

instructions: Cook onion, garlic, ginger, add vegetables and spices, simmer with coconut milk.

instructions: Cook mushrooms and onion, add rice, gradually add broth, finish with parmesan and butter.

instructions: Mix ingredients, scoop onto baking sheet, bake at 180C until golden.
